name: Sofa dungeon
description:
This game is created for the “Stay at home jam”. I develop the theme “Sofa is a monster”.  You can find inspiration of other theme in the game.

Goal

The goal is to explore all dungeon and survive. Only other furnitures are your real enemies. Humans are really boring but if you attack a villager, they will kill you.

Controls

Gamepad(Xbox)

Joystick to move

A to attack

B to use your rage (heal you when you hit an enemy)
